title: Virtual Environment Simulation-Based Nursing Education Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Knowledge (Infection Control, Patient Assessment, etc.) and LMS Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Introduction of simulation-based education to strengthen non-face-to-face practical training post-COVID-19, with core goals of enhancing learner engagement and educational satisfaction

learning_goals: Learners perform triage classification and emergency nursing procedures with 80% accuracy in a virtual simulation environment.
Learners achieve a Learning Engagement Scale Score (LESS) of 4.0/5.0 or higher when using online LMS-based simulation tools.
Learners obtain an average score of 4.5/5.0 or higher in post-simulation educational satisfaction surveys.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
